author: cbs8
title: Global Heavy Duty Motor Oil Market 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON About heavy duty motor oil
HDMO refers to motor oils for diesel engines used in highway vehicles and in mining and agricultural equipment. HDMO reduces friction and wear and tear of the moving engine's crankshaft, connecting rods, bearings, and pistons. It also serves as an effective coolant while inhibiting the formation of deposits and preventing rust and corrosion.
The market figures in the report includes different viscosity grade variants, namely mono-grade and multi-grade. The report also gives an overview of different function class and chemical class of HDMO additives such as dispersants, antioxidants, and detergents.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global heavy duty motor oil market to grow at a CAGR of 1.98% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
Technavio's report, Global Heavy Duty Motor Oil Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from various industry experts. The report includes a comprehensive discussion of the market, an extensive coverage on different types of engine oil standards and specifications, application areas, chemical class, viscosity grades, and demand-supply dynamics in various geographies. The report provides comments on both the existing market landscape and its growth prospects over the forecast period. The report further includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
The report presents data on the following segments of the market:
- Engine type: power output, engine speed, functional type, and application
- Engine oil standards and specifications: SAE, ILSAC, API, ACEA, LMOA, and others
- Function class and chemical class: dispersants, VII, detergents, anti-wear, antioxidants, and others
- Viscosity grade: mono-grade engine oils and multi-grade engine oils
- Geography: APAC, EMEA, North America , and ROW
